content: This fixes a divergence between lean 3 and lean 4 behavior of rcases, and it's a mathlib refactor PR so I would like to not let it sit for too long. I think it's ready to go once it is updated for any changes added in the meanwhile.
This important PR looks good to me. Any reason not to merge it immediately?
no, I think it just got forgotten and I didn't want to merge it myself
I looked through it too -- other than the tactic modifications it's all removal of _s that we know we don't want to write!
